root: ^Good morning Makra! Are you knitting again?
^Hey Yuki. Yes, I am making vests for the group, autumn is coming soon after all.
^That's sweet of you! You know I am grateful that you made all of our bed sheets. If you didn't we certainly would not have passed the last 2 winters.
^Thanks. It's the least I can  do. It's not like I know how to hunt like you, cook like Willow or bargain like Claire.  Sometimes I feel like I'm not helping much...
^Don't say that! Your knitting saved our lives!
^Is something wrong Makra? You don't seem too happy.
^No... it's nothing... I just need more supplies. I'm starting to run out...
^Why didn't you tell me? Next time we are in town I can buy what you need!
^No it's alright, I know we don't have much money to spare on things like this...
^Nonsense! Makra I'm sure we can spare a bit and if we can't I'll just give you a part of my week's shares to buy your supplies.
^Really?! Thanks, Yuki you truly are the best!
^No worries, next time we are in town let's go shopping together.
